prefix.description: Optional prefix to be applied before mobile number (e.g., '+91')

pattern.description: Regex pattern that the mobile number must match (e.g., '^[6-9][0-9]{9}$')

isActive.description: Whether this validation configuration is active

maxLength.description: Maximum allowed length of mobile number (excluding prefix)

minLength.description: Minimum allowed length of mobile number (excluding prefix)

errorMessage.description: Custom error message to show when validation fails

allowedStartingDigits.description: List of allowed starting digits for mobile numbers (e.g., ['6','7','8','9'])

rules.description: Object containing mobile number validation properties

validationName.description: Unique name for the validation configuration (e.g., 'mobileNumberValidation')
